meanings.definition: To enjoy or appreciate something fully
meanings.sent1: I was savoring the delicious meal my mom cooked.
meanings.sent2: She spent the afternoon savoring the beautiful scenery in the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be savoring the warmth of the sun on its fur.
meanings.sent4: As she closed her eyes, she felt like savoring the moment forever.
meanings.sent5: Savoring the music, he closed his eyes and let the melody wash over him.

meanings.definition: The act of tasting or smelling something with pleasure
meanings.sent1: The savoring of the freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't resist the savoring of the fragrant flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The savoring of the aromatic coffee made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The savoring of the homemade soup brought back fond memories.
meanings.sent5: With each savoring of the wine, he appreciated its complexity more.
